Run Your Web App via port 80 - Sails.js

I have included a local.js file to the App. Here is my Code to Run the WebApp via port 80 without 1337 . Take your port with this small code port: process.env.PORT || 80,

Now go ahead with the local.js like in the description in the sails.js document! first i have inculded this in the development.js file. and saved this.

The development.js File!


The development.js.bak File!

The local.js File!

Pingo The WebApp is running now on localhost
